Title: Reframing the discourse: Ethnography, Bernstein and the distribution of reading attainment by gender
Abstract: © 2017, The Author(s) 2017.This paper has two aims: to introduce readers to Bernstein’s concept of languages of description, interpreted through the lens of ethnography; and to demonstrate the value of this approach to theory-making by showing how a qualitative study conducted on these principles led to new explanations for gender differences in literacy attainment that can be tested using PISA data.
